text: Credit : ennett Raglin / Getty Images for Haddad Teresa Giudice Accused of Violating Her Probation — Will She Go Back to Prison? by 0 Shares Advertisement It ’ s been a tough road for Teresa Giudice of late. The Real Housewives of New Jersey star lost her mother, Antonia Gorga, suddenly in early March, and now, she might be at risk of going back to prison?! Well, not so fast. But there is cause for concern for fans of the Italian gal. Credit : Charles Sykes / Bravo According to court documents obtained by TMZ, Teresa failed to report two traffic tickets while under supervised release ( aka probation ) for her fraud conviction.
